attributes.action: Prevent the closure of Wessex Place, Cambridge, dual registered, nursing and care home for people over the age of 65 who have functional mental health needs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: One death has occured already due to the trauma of impending forced eviction.This could all be avoided if the local PCT funds this project in accordance with its duty of care and the law. Our duty to our parents, friends and family as they grow old is immense, do not let a faceless PCT kill them off for the sake of a few pounds. The banks get £500 billion, we want a few thousand to save lives and allow our old to live in dignity.
